name: Jordan 1 Low Bred Toe
description: Showcasing distinctive color blocking from the 2018 release of an AJ1 High is the Air Jordan 1 Low 'Bred Toe.' This low-top features an all-leather upper with white quarter panels, a black forefoot overlay, a crimson toe box, and a matching red finish on the collar and heel overlay with a stitched Wings logo. The tongue is black nylon and has Jumpman branding in white. It's built on a rubber cupsole with crisp white sidewalls with a red rubber outsole.
